greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Replace n with concatenation of its divisors >1.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: a037277 n = read $ concat $ map show $ tail $ a027750_row n
else: return int("".join(str(d) for d in divisors_gt1))
print([a(n) for n in range(1, 40)]) # _Michael S. Branicky_, Dec 31 2020
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
